name: bwh_challenge
description: * Create a very simple program that has a two buttons and a table. * Button 1 should call you node.js backend and return a list of flowers (20 or so – one must be “sunflower”) from a mysql database – that you will create. * The flowers should have a name and description. * The second button, when clicked will filter  the records to only show sunflower.
author: Henry
